Demon, Corruptor Azizou

This small humanoid creature has a jackal-like head, a mouthful of fangs, and large, round eyes with slit-pupils of gray. Its grayish skin is covered in patches of coarse black hair. Membranous wings protrude from its back and its hands and feet end in sharpened claws.



Azizou Demon

CR 4

XP 1,200
CE Small outsider (chaotic, demon, evil, extraplanar)
Init +2; Senses darkvision 60 ft.; Perception +11
DEFENSE
AC 19, touch 13, flat-footed 17 (+2 Dex, +6 natural, +1 size)
hp 22 (4d10)
Fort +1, Ref +6, Will +4
DR 5/cold iron; Immune electricity, poison; Resist acid 10, cold 10, fire 10; SR 15
OFFENSE
Spd 30 ft., fly 50 ft. (good)
Melee 2 claws +8 (1d4+2), bite +8 (1d6+2)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
Special Attacks rend (2 claws, 2d4+3), whisper of madness
Spell-Like Abilities (CL 7th)
At will—cause fear (DC 11), desecrate, detect good, detect thoughts (DC 12), invisibility (self only), scare (DC 12), stinking cloud (13)
1/day—summon (level 3, 1 azizou 35%)
STATISTICS
Str 14, Dex 15, Con 11, Int 8, Wis 10, Cha 10
Base Atk +4; CMB +5; CMD 17
Feats Weapon Focus (bite), Weapon Focus (claw)
Skills Acrobatics +9, Escape Artist +9, Fly +15, Perception +11, Stealth +13; Racial Modifiers +4 Perception
Languages Abyssal, Common; telepathy 100 ft.
ECOLOGY
Environment any (Abyss)
Organization solitary
Treasure none


The azizou is slightly larger than the barizou and is quite strong (for its size). They are relentless combatants and love to inflict pain and suffering on their opponents in combat.

The typical azizou stands 3 feet tall and weighs about 100 pounds.
